question: Enroll in a course
ans: To take a course on CoursInfo, you'll need to enroll.When you enroll in a course, you'll be able to start right away.

question: Promotions on CoursInfo
ans: You may receive a free or discounted subscription as part of a special promotion.To see any promotional discounts you may have Log into your CoursInfo account.

question: Course Certificates
ans: A Course Certificate is an official CoursInfo credential that confirms that you successfully completed a course on CoursInfo.

question: How do I add additional learners to my account?
ans: Yes! You can easily add more learners to your existing plan by going to your Account page
